channel.title: ISO 20022 Payments
channel.description: Pain001 is a Python library that automates the creation of ISO 20022 payment messages. It simplifies payment processing by creating ISO 20022-compliant payment files, thus delivering faster payments automation.

item.title: ISO 20022 Payments
item.description: Pain001 is a Python library that automates the creation of ISO 20022 payment messages. It simplifies payment processing by creating ISO 20022-compliant payment files, thus delivering faster payments automation.
